text:
The police on Friday arrested A. Saravanan (35), an electrician, on the charges of giving illegal power connections to various houses in the city, causing huge losses to Tangedco.

He took between Rs. 10,000 and Rs 25,000 to give these power connections.

The arrest was made under Tamil Nadu Electricity Act, 2003, on a complaint given by Tangedco officials.
title: Illegal power connections; man held
